SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AddImportantDayDialog
A modal Swing dialog for adding a new ImportantDay of type Anniversary, Birthday, or Occasion.
Anniversary
The Anniversary class represents an anniversary, which is a specific type of ImportantDay.
Birthday
Represents a birthday event, a specific subtype of ImportantDay.
HttpClientHelper
A utility class that handles HTTP communication between the client and the server for performing operations related to important days.
ImportantDay
An abstract base class representing an important day with common fields: name, date, and description.
ImportantDayFactory
The ImportantDayFactory class is responsible for creating instances of different types of ImportantDay objects.
ImportantDayPanel
A Swing panel that visually displays the details of a single ImportantDay.
ImportantDaysManager
Acts as the controller between the client UI and the server.
LocalDateAdapter
This class is a custom TypeAdapter for Gson to handle serialization and deserialization of LocalDate objects.
Main
The main class to launch the Important Days Tracker application.
MainFrame
 
Occasion
The Occasion class represents an occasion event, which is a specific type of ImportantDay.
